metadata.name: Ape Fire
metadata.description:
This is a 1/1 limited edition. all my art is created by photographing Real Fire and then digitally manipulating the fire like paint. I will email the original photo of fire that was used to create this to the owner Also, This is one of My first animated pieces bringing the fire to life like never before. To see more on my unique and rare process please see the link below I am the only artist that paints with real fire. 
https://pyropainter.com/process
